_header: Inguar and Ubbe Beorn was the third / Lothbrogs sons
_description: The three sons of Lothbrog — two alliterative lines

CamPem82.Transcription:
Ynguar and Vbbe Beorn was þe þriddeLoþebrokes sunes
                    Loþe weren criste
CamPem82.Note:
Not Pembroke College 32, as in Hamer (1995)
XHamer,  Richard. 
             A Manuscript Index to the Index of Middle English Verse.
         London: British Library, 1995; written as one
                    line in MS.
